body:
Continuing the discussion in [7855](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/7855). @scheibelp 

### Description of the issue : 
The current install recipe for py-matplotlib fails to find the .pc file for qhull and this leads to a rebuild of qhull even if qhull is already installed. Where this causes an issue is if one is using intel compilers the relevant patch doesn't get applied as explained in [8303](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8303).

This issue is also referenced [here](https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib/issues/5745).

Can this be fixed by modifying the setup.cfg file ?
title: Fix qhull .pc file issue for matplotlib install
